name: Fried Hard Boiled Eggs in Hot Red Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1 stalk of lemongrass (trimmed quartered and crushed),
2 large tomatoes (skinned, seeded, and chopped to a pulp),
recipeInstructions: 1. Process the rempah into a smooth paste.
2. Deep fry the eggs until golden brown.
3. Put some oil in a wok and fry the rempah until it becomes fragrant.
4. Add the lemongrass, tomatoes, and sugar.
5. Cook for 2-3 minutes until it becomes a thick paste.
7. Stir in the soy sauce and lime juice.
8. Add up to 2 tbsp water to thin the sauce then add the eggs and toss until coated.
